channel.title: mteresa on CDSB
channel.description: Recent content in mteresa on CDSB

item.description: I am a data analyst with experience in ecology and marketing, I currently work in CONABIO (Mexicoâ€™s National Commission of Biodiversity) where I do statistical analysis related to biodiversity. I also enjoy teaching, I teach statistic courses to master students in Data Science and to bachelors in Mathematics and Actuarial Sciences at ITAM. Lastly, I love R, I am co-organizer of R-Ladies CDMX and I regularly give short courses in R.
